recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (rinsed and drained): 1 can (15 ounces) - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - red onion (finely chopped): 1/4 cup - Kalamata olives (sliced): 1/4 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - parsley (chopped): 1/4 cup - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Rinse and drain chickpeas. Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes, finely chop red onion, and slice Kalamata olives. 2. Combine Salad: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. 4. Dress the Salad: Pour the dressing over the salad mixture and toss to combine thoroughly. 5. Garnish and Chill: Sprinkle chopped parsley over the salad. Refrigerate for at least 15 minutes to allow flavors to blend before serving.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 35g, Dietary Fiber: 9g, Sodium: 430mg, Saturated Fat: 4g, Total Fat: 14g, Protein: 10g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 5g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe: Approximately 920 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chickpeas: 260 calories per can Cucumber: 16 calories Cherry Tomatoes: 32 calories Red Onion: 15 calories Kalamata Olives: 88 calories Feta Cheese: 396 calories per 1/2 cup Parsley: Negligible Lemon Juice: 10 calories per 3 tablespoons Olive Oil: 239 calories per 2 tablespoons Garlic, Oregano, Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 4
